author: Preetika Rana
title: Drug That Promises to Kill Flu in a Day Approved in Japan
text:
Japan has approved a drug that its maker says can kill the flu virus in 24 hours, advancing what health experts believe could be a breakthrough in the way the illness is treated.
Friday’s fast-tracked approval from Japan’s health ministry means Shionogi & Co. can begin selling the drug, called Xofluza, in the country. But the pill may not be available in Japan before May because the national insurer has yet to set a price, a company spokesman said.
